casebody.data:
William H. Lowe v. Bellows & Squires Company, Inc., et al. April 13, 1942. Record No. 2482.

Present, Campbell, C. J., and Holt, Hudgins, Gregory, Browning and Spratley, JJ.

Ammon G. Dunton, E. Garnett Mercer, Jr., George E. Allen and George E. Allen, Jr., for the appellant. R. O. Norris, Jr. and F. V. Watkins, for the appellees.

Richmond
